summary: With the help of an alien organism, a man brainwashes audiences through television; a troubled high school student is determined to stop them.
cast: Tom Bresnahan|Cynthia Preston|David Gale|George Buza|Christine Kossak|Bret Pearson|Bernice Quiggan|Susannah Hoffmann|Justine Campbell|Robert King|Kenneth McGregor|Vinetta Strombergs|Richard Gira|Wendy Springate|Harry Booker|Peter Read|Steve Mousseau|Garry Bron|Garry Brown|Sarah Chapple|Carol Lazare
keywords: alien|hallucination|falling out a window|eaten alive|psychotronic film
title: El cerebro
